name: COCO'S DREAM By Mujnu
description:
COCO'S DREAM is a game where you fulfill a coconuts dream to reach an island and grow there....

MOVEMENT  :   You cannot move using the arrow keys, instead you have to hover on the 2 boxes on top.

THE RIGHT BOX IS FOR UP

THE LEFT BOX IS FOR DOWN

CHALLENGE  :  AVOID THE SHARKS COMING FROM THE FRONT TO REACH COCO'S ISLAND

CREDITS:

Thanks to https://www.dreamstime.com/coconut-eight-bit-pixel-art-game-icon-retro-video-sty...  for the coconut image in the game
